about_the_game:
PRIM is a Burton-esque 2D point-and-click adventure game in which you play as Death's daughter.

Story


Strange things are happening in the Land of the Dead. Instead of reaping souls, Thanatos, the Angel of Death, has to deal with his teenage daughter Prim. Every night, Prim has the same dream: An oddly familiar human boy cries out for her help. Needless to say that our heroine tries to answer the call. There‘s just one tiny problem: The Grim Reaper has strictly forbidden her to enter the Land of the Living – she‘s not ready for the immense power she‘d develop there, he claims.

Key features

  • Help Prim escape!
  • Meet quirky characters!
  • Solve tricky puzzles!
  • Play as Prim's spider eye sidekick!
  • Playtime: 30-60 minutes!
  • Lovingly handdrawn, black-and-white 2D graphics!
  • Danny Elfman-ish orchestral soundtrack!
  • Traditional frame-by-frame animation!
  • Classical point-and-click gameplay with modern perks, such as a one-click interface, a hot spot display and fast travel!
  • Voice acting in English and German!
